location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.261 of 1852 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Commodore George Robinson, Commanding Indian Naval Squadron, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Request to issue instructions to the Office commanding the Honourable Company's steam frigate Queen, to receive on board two female slaves recently rescued from Bahrain, and to convey them to the Residency at Bushire.
